alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:02PM AKST until December 25 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES OVER THE CENTRAL PANHANDLE THIS EVENING... Snow continues to be heavy to moderate over the Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island areas this evening. Another round of snow is expected for the northern panhandle Sun afternoon into Sun night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Glacier Bay, Eastern Chichagof Island and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From noon to 9 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow rates will be Sun evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
